subject: Relief for Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic  - reg.
text: IRdv 77rv TTAf xiferarut 7h4 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 MT (sm 4ar7 &k {TATf 4A1d4) W7 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 5-5 & 6, Raer-10, ERGT, # fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Atmanirbhar Bharat/2o21 Policy No. 18.74/2021 dated 13th October 2021 {Decision taken on E-Office File No.NHAI/COVID-19/ RoadMap/CMD/2020 (Comp.No.5788)} Sub: Relief for  Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic. MoRTH vide Letter No_ COVID-19/RoadMap/ JS(H)/2020 [e-183777] dated 08.10.2021 on the subject mentioned above has extended some relief measures provided earlier vide MoRTH letter dated 03.08.2021_ A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation. 2 _ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above zjilwoxt (S.K: Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3 Web Admin for circulation: HT PT Ri  NHAI Copy
